category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_EnforceActualDatesBeforeNow
preference.preference_description: In Schedule Manager, determines if dates must be set to a date prior to the current date, or if they can be set to any date. Valid Values: true - Forces the use of a date prior to current date. false - Specifies that any date can be used.
